entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
